trans-unit.source: Specifies the localization attributes for a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_baml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-baml-md.md)] class or class member.
This attribute can be applied to a class, property, or method.
For more information on how to use localization attributes, see [Localization Attributes and Comments](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.LocalizabilityAttribute"></xref> class with a specified localization category.
Gets the category setting of the localization attribute's targeted value.
The following table shows the modifiability settings of the localization attribute.

|Category setting|Meaning| |----------------------|-------------| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|Resource does not belong to a standard category.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A lengthy piece of descriptive text.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A single line of text, such as a title.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A short text string, such as a control label.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> or related control.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox> or related control.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> or related control, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem>.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> or related control, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> or related control, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RadioButton> or related control.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> or related control.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink> or related control.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> or other panel that can contain text.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] data.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|Font-related data such as font family, font style, or font size.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|Inherits category from parent node.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|Do not localize this resource.

This does not apply to any child nodes of the resource.| |<xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>|Do not localize this resource, or any of its child nodes whose category is set to <xref:System.Windows.LocalizationCategory>.|
The category setting of the localization attribute.
Gets or sets the modifiability setting of the localization attribute's targeted value.
The following table shows the modifiability settings of the localization attribute.

|Modifiability setting|Meaning| |---------------------------|-------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Modifiability>|Targeted value is modifiable by localizers.| |<xref:System.Windows.Modifiability>|Targeted value is not modifiable by localizers.| |<xref:System.Windows.Modifiability>|Targeted value's modifiability is inherited from its parent node.|
The modifiability setting of the localization attribute.
Gets or sets the readability setting of the localization attribute's targeted value.
The following table shows the readability settings of the localization attribute.

|Readability setting|Meaning| |-------------------------|-------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Readability>|Targeted value is readable text.| |<xref:System.Windows.Readability>|Targeted value is not readable.| |<xref:System.Windows.Readability>|Targeted value's readability is inherited from its parent node.|
The readability setting of the localization attribute.
